name: Earthworm Jim 2
description: From Evil the Cat’s’Circus of the Scars’ to the planet of Meat, join Jim on a madcap chase across the galaxy. Saving cows, thwarting lawyers and outsmarting Psy-Crow are all in a day’s work for Jim. Are you up to the challenge? Can you handle the awesome new weapons? Excellent! Then stop reading this. Try it now!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsProcessor: Pentium 133 with 3D card. Pentium 166 without hardware acceleration.Memory: 8 MBGraphics: 256-color SVGA video graphic card

reviews.review_text: Poor response by keyboard and mouse. Rom occasionally lags. No sound effects. Do not want anymore.
As I stated in my review for earthworm jim, this game is butched on the Pc. DO ALL YOU CAN TO BUY IT ON A CONSOLE. Neither versions of these games are worth it.
So how come you have that much in your wallet?
